Constructs a GameWorld from passed variables.

Parameters:
inWorldName - The name of the new world.
worldX - The X coordinate of the new world.
worldY - The Y coordinate of the new world.
newPlayerDir - The direction of the player.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
The act method of the world. Does the following:

-Checks for the current area.

-Moves the player in the world.

-Opens and closes the in-game menu.

-Checks for wild pokemon (if in tall grass).

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.World

areaCheck

public void areaCheck()
Checks for the current area of the world.

gameWorldSetup

public void gameWorldSetup()
Sets up the new world.

Adds:

-NPC's

-world tiles

-act and paint order

-saves the world

public void healPokemon()
Heals the pokemon of the player to their max hp, and full PP's.

initWorld

public void initWorld()
Adds NPC's to the world. Runs off RGB colour values. ColorCodes: -1 | White -16777216 | Black -65536 | Red -16711936 | Green -16776961 | Blue -256 | Yellow -16711681 | Cyan -65281 | Magenta

newBattle

public void newBattle(int pokemonID)
Creats a new trainer Pokemon battle.

Parameters:
pokemonID - The id of the NPC's pokemon.

newBattle

public void newBattle(java.lang.String pokemonName,
                      int pokemonLevel)
Creates a new wild Pokemon battle.

Parameters:
pokemonName - The name of the wild Pokemon.
pokemonLevel - The level of the wild Pokemon.

npcInit

public void npcInit()
Adds NPC's to the world. Runs off RGB colour values.
